channel.title: Need help on adding brand new shop
channel.description:
i dont realy get how to make a new handler and shop items im only havinng f2p things in it but could some1 please tell me how to make a shop handler and how to add items
thanks.

item.title: Need help on adding brand new shop
item.dc:creator: @season_scape season_scape
item.description:
@season_scape wrote:

go to shops.java you should see i long line like this

shop = 34	Team_Capes_Shop_-_26_to_50---------- 2-----2-----4365-----10-----4367------10--------4369------10

Team_Capes_Shop_-_26_to_50: name of shop
while doing yourshop dont include ----------
the rest works like this

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

Read full topic
